about.title: About Me
about.name: Luis Carlos Picado Rojas
about.description1: I'm a Software Architect specializing in full-stack development. I design and build RESTful APIs following Clean Architecture principles, implement Machine Learning models and neural networks, and create modern, responsive user interfaces.
about.description2: My experience spans from modern web application development to third-party service integrations and databases. I apply robust security (authentication, rate limiting, circuit breakers), agile methodologies, automated testing and technical documentation to ensure maintainable, high-quality code.

trashia.name: TrashIA
trashia.description: AI-powered REST API for waste classification into 6 categories using TensorFlow. Features include AI chat (Gemini), barcode scanning for recyclability, and recycling point location via OpenStreetMap.
trashia.details:
Full-stack AI application for waste classification and recycling assistance.

• Image classification into 6 categories using TensorFlow
• AI-powered chat assistant with Google Gemini
• Barcode scanning for product recyclability
• Recycling point location using OpenStreetMap
• Multi-language support (EN/ES)

Tech: React, TypeScript, FastAPI, Python, TensorFlow, Redis

chess3d.name: Chess 3D
chess3d.description: Interactive 3D chess game built with React and Three.js. Features realistic 3D graphics, complete chess logic, and immersive gaming experience.
chess3d.details:
Immersive 3D chess experience built with modern web technologies.

• Realistic 3D graphics with Three.js
• Complete chess logic with chess.js library
• Interactive 3D board and pieces
• Smooth animations and camera controls

Tech: React, Three.js, chess.js

frontend3.name: Frontend Proyecto 3
frontend3.description: Web application developed with Angular, TypeScript and Bootstrap. Includes dynamic navigation, reusable components and responsive design.
frontend3.details:
Angular web application with modern architecture.

• Dynamic routing and navigation
• Reusable component library
• Responsive design with Bootstrap
• TypeScript for type safety

Tech: Angular, TypeScript, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3

crud3.name: CRUD Proyecto 3
crud3.description: Complete REST API developed with Spring Boot and Gradle. Implements CRUD operations with layered architecture and best practices.
crud3.details:
Enterprise-level REST API with Spring Boot.

• Full CRUD operations
• Layered architecture (Controller, Service, Repository)
• JWT authentication
• CORS configuration

Tech: Java, Spring Boot, JWT, Gradle
